channel.title: ~Eternal Flame is now 562 :) ~Hiring~ Development team, 562 items + More~
channel.description:
- WEBCLIENT -SOON - SOULWARS!!! WITH ZEAL!! - Pest Control - Bork - Barrel Chest - Kq - Godwars Dungeon - Td - Sweet economy - Barrows - Hand Cannon - Full screen and HD - Spirit Shields - Teleing works - Corp beast - Smf Forum - Great economy - Almost every skill - Lots of players - 24/7 vps - Newly server - Looking for mature staff -all 562 items -varrock shops -clanwars pking ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Were are adding major updates including the following: 70 Updates: 562 items added 562 gfx added 562 emotes added 562 npcs Ancient curses rewritten, with near perfect formulas! All items now wieldable and have the right requirements Moved Farming to Lunar Ilse Move Woodcutting to Lunar Ilse aswell Added Inferno Adze Fixed the godsword spec anims Fixed all bugs Fixed all dupes Changed Exp rate from 300 to 800 + the server bonus, fairly good exp rate Cut down on some of the cache memory Autocache downloads now Added starter : Newcomer Map click for a great start Perfect switching, good for hybriding Ability to Rush Redid some drops and drop rates Autocasting redone Added new gfx and emote to teleports Warriors guild Fixed glowing in the mage book Fullscreen + Resizable Robgobs new alert system New skys Corporeal beast Draynor Falador Al Karid Canifis Varrock New donator shop with dragons Brimhaven agility course added Fishing moved to fishing guild PvP drops An NPC to reset stats Tormented demons Skillcape emotes DFS special Spirit shield effects Staff of light New banking interface New login box Background switching Remember me feature Tzhaar fight pits Duel Arena Great slayer skill and Slayer Tower Brimhaven dungeon Taverly dungeon Ancients Xp counter ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Newly server re-opened as 562 :) ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Staff info: ! Staff Requirement's ! 1. Be active and online atleast an hour per day 2. Dont abuse powers 3. Be active on forums 4. Respectful to players 5. Have an account atleast a week old on the server 6. Be mature! 7. Don't joke around constantly 8. Be professional 9. IF you can't follow these requirements then don't expect to be staff on Eternal Flame ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ------------------------------------------------------------ ::: :::Positions available::: ::: -----------------------------------Owner 1/1---------------------------- -----------------------------------Co-owner 1/1------------------------ -----------------------------------Admin's 1/2-------------------------- -----------------------------------Mod's 1/3----------------------------- ----------------------------------Server Advertiser 0/2---------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Note: Staff will rank up eventually, example."Mod for a week doing a good job... Promoted to admin".. Most staff who are active and stay with the server will atleast experince each rank except for owner. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ -- ` - - ` - - ` - - ` - - ` - - ` - - ` - - ` - - ` - - ` - - ` - - ` - - ` How to apply! Forums - www.eternalflame.freeforums.org If you rather have an interview through MSN then, message the owner at his msn - Mt12094@hotmail.com Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?wz5o5l1ezv3thgp Before applying on the forums go throughout the forums so you know what's going on and it could possibley improve your app. :) ----------------------- Your gonna have to teleport\walk places to get to certain locations, I didnt add teleport's to certain places to make it more runescape like heeeheee haha :P.. -----------------------
Thanks,
Sincerly,
-[b]Flame[/b]
Leeched?: Nope.. " kbye "

item.title: ~Eternal Flame is now 562 :) ~Hiring~ Development team, 562 items + More~
item.dc:creator: @flame255 flame255
item.description:
@flame255 wrote:

  • WEBCLIENT -SOON
  • SOULWARS!!! WITH ZEAL!!
  • Pest Control
  • Bork
  • Barrel Chest
  • Kq
  • Godwars Dungeon
  • Td
  • Sweet economy
  • Barrows
  • Hand Cannon
  • Full screen and HD
  • Spirit Shields
  • Teleing works
  • Corp beast
  • Smf Forum
  • Great economy
  • Almost every skill
  • Lots of players
  • 24/7 vps
  • Newly server
  • Looking for mature staff
    -all 562 items
    -varrock shops
    -clanwars pking
Were are adding major updates including the following:
70 Updates:
562 items added
562 gfx added
562 emotes added
562 npcs
Ancient curses rewritten, with near perfect formulas!
All items now wieldable and have the right requirements
Moved Farming to Lunar Ilse
Move Woodcutting to Lunar Ilse aswell
Added Inferno Adze
Fixed the godsword spec anims
Fixed all bugs
Fixed all dupes
Changed Exp rate from 300 to 800 + the server bonus, fairly good exp rate
Cut down on some of the cache memory
Autocache downloads now
Added starter : Newcomer Map click for a great start 
Perfect switching, good for hybriding
Ability to Rush
Redid some drops and drop rates
Autocasting redone
Added new gfx and emote to teleports
Warriors guild
Fixed glowing in the mage book
Fullscreen + Resizable
Robgobs new alert system
New skys
Corporeal beast
Draynor
Falador
Al Karid
Canifis
Varrock
New donator shop with dragons
Brimhaven agility course added
Fishing moved to fishing guild
PvP drops
An NPC to reset stats
Tormented demons
Skillcape emotes
DFS special
Spirit shield effects
Staff of light
New banking interface
New login box
Background switching
Remember me feature
Tzhaar fight pits
Duel Arena
Great slayer skill and Slayer Tower
Brimhaven dungeon
Taverly dungeon
Ancients
Xp counter

Newly server re-opened as 562 


Staff info:
! Staff Requirement's !
1. Be active and online atleast an hour per day
2. Dont abuse powers
3. Be active on forums
4. Respectful to players
5. Have an account atleast a week old on the server
6. Be mature!
7. Don't joke around constantly
8. Be professional
9. IF you can't follow these requirements then don't expect to be staff on Eternal Flame

::: :::Positions available::: :::
-----------------------------------Owner 1/1----------------------------
-----------------------------------Co-owner 1/1------------------------
-----------------------------------Admin’s 1/2--------------------------
-----------------------------------Mod’s 1/3-----------------------------
----------------------------------Server Advertiser 0/2----------------------

Note: Staff will rank up eventually, example.“Mod for a week doing a good job… Promoted to admin”…
Most staff who are active and stay with the server will atleast experince each rank except for owner.

-- ` - - ` - - ` - - ` - - ` - - ` - - ` - - ` - - ` - - ` - - ` - - ` - - `
      How to apply!
Forums - www.eternalflame.freeforums.org
If you rather have an interview through MSN then, message the owner at his msn - Mt12094@hotmail.com
Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?wz5o5l1ezv3thgp
Before applying on the forums go throughout the forums so you know what's going on and it could possibley improve your app. :)
-----------------------
Your gonna have to teleport\walk places to get to certain locations, I didnt add teleport's to certain places to make it more runescape like
heeeheee haha :P..
-----------------------

Thanks, 

Sincerly,


-[b]Flame[/b]


Leeched?: Nope.. " kbye "
